comments:
(I was told it was supposed to have been fixed by bug 77567 but my experience 
shows otherwise).

Preconditions: 
   * Select an item which has properties divided into categories, with one 
category having exactly one entry. 

Action:
   * Collapse the category with only one entry.
   * Select another item
